QuestData.Title: Into Arathi
QuestData.Description: You should go on ahead and warn the other side of the span about this, $n.$B$BOver the bridge to the north you'll find Refuge Pointe, the stronghold of the Alliance in Arathi. Tell Captain Nials to keep an eye out for these Twilight's Hammer curs.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Arathi Highlands and speak with Captain Nials in Refuge Pointe.
